title: Open note taker app
text:
AS A small business owner
I WANT to be able to write and save notes
SO THAT I can organize my thoughts and keep track of tasks I need to complete.

It will open a landing page with a link to a notes pages

title: Show notes
text: Clicking on the link to the notes page, a page with existing notes listed in the left-hand column, plus empty fields to enter a new note title and the noteâ€™s text in the right-hand column.
